dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 3107 IH: Diesel Emissions Reduction Act of 2017
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Poe of Texas (for himself, Ms. Matsui, Mr. Reed, Ms. Barrag√°n, Mr. Messer, and Mr. Lowenthal) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To reauthorize the diesel emissions reduction program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Diesel Emissions Reduction Act of 2017.

section.header: Reauthorization of diesel emissions reduction program
section.text: Section 797(a) of the Energy Policy Act of 2005 (42 U.S.C. 16137(a)) is amended by striking 2016 and inserting 2022.
